p: In this work, we exploited the Design of Experiments (DoE) as a tool of the Quality by Design approach (QbD), with the aim to develop optimized formulations in terms of particles with small size and high homogeneity. In particular, a full factorial design was developed with two independent variables (x1, x2) and two levels (âˆ’1, +1) ( Table 1 and Table 2, Figure 1).
